issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Android: ImageView: 'Autorotate' property behavior should match on iOS and Android
fields.environment:
SDK - 3.1.0.v20130327135307
Studio - 3.1.0.201303261815
Device: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3.2, Nexus 7 (V4.1)
Mac OS - 10.8
CLI - 3.0.25-alpha

comments.body:
The behavior is Tab 2 is incorrect.  Tab 3 is fine, since the default behavior for iOS and Android are different (for performance reasons).
Will look into this.

Behaviour is now same on both iOS and android.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130405170202
Titanium Â Studio:3.1.0.201304011603
Device: Samsung GALAXY Tab (3.2) and Nexus 7 Android 4.1 and iPad 4 iOS 6.0
